condition_helper: Switches are operated based on these conditions. To create complex conditions select 'Nested conditions'
condition_junction_helper: If nested conditions are joined with 'And' all conditions must apply, otherwise only one condition needs to be true for the whole block to evaluate to true.
end_scene_helper: The following scene will be enabled if the condition evaluates to false
m_descr:
Switches mutiple switches and scenes based on various conditions such as time, day of week, presence and sensors. Multiple conditions can be combined using boolean operators.
Check github.com/maros/Zway-ConditionSwitch for detailed documentation.
presence_mode_helper: Sets the multiple presence modes when the condition is met
start_scene_helper: The following scene will be enabled if the condition evaluates to true
switches_helper: List of switches that should be controlled by condition switch
time_helper: Sets the multiple time periods when the condition is met
